sentence.Network_en: Poor Dr Pegler got terribly behindhand with his appointments.
sentence.Network_cn: 可怜的佩格勒博士大大落后于当初的约定。

sentence.Network_en: The prime minister's initial ministerial appointments haven't pleased all his supporters.
sentence.Network_cn: 首相最初的大臣任命没能让他所有的支持者都满意。

sentence.Network_en: I was as tardy as ever for the afternoon appointments.
sentence.Network_cn: 和以往一样，下午的约见我又迟到了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: You should be aware of all the appointments and whereabouts of the executives ., 你应了解主管人员的所有约会安排和行踪.
participants have to rise early catch breakfast discussions and then spend the day trudging around in the snow to their next appointments .与会者必须早早起床赶赴早餐讨论会，白天里他们还要在雪地中一路跋涉到接下来的会议地点。
He is always punctual for appointments ., 他总是准时赴约.
All the appointments are filled., 所有的预约时间都排满了.

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) -亿城英语 ... by any possibility 可能 by appointment 按照约定 by bicycle 骑脚踏车.
失望就变成了上天的指示(His appointment)。所以说任何发生在你身上的事都是好的。

entry.def: The appointment of a person to a particular job is the choice of that person to do it.

example.ex: His appointment to the Cabinet would please the right-wing.
example.tran: 他被任命为内阁成员会让右翼党派很高兴。
在1985年他被委任为外交部长

entry.def: An appointment is a job or position of responsibility.

example.ex: Mr Fay is to take up an appointment as a researcher with the Royal Society.
example.tran: 费伊先生将担任皇家学会研究员的职务。

entry.def: If you have an appointment with someone, you have arranged to see them at a particular time, usually in connection with their work or for a serious purpose.

example.ex: She has an appointment with her accountant...
example.tran: 她和她的会计约好了见面。

example.ex: I made an appointment to see a specialist.

entry.def: If something can be done by appointment, people can arrange in advance to do it at a particular time.

auth_sentence.content: The appointments are due to be announced on Monday.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The appointments are due to be announced on Monday.

auth_sentence.content: These appointments were mentioned by the club website.
auth_sentence.res_content: These appointments were mentioned by the club website.
